definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Boolean" id="toggle">toggle</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:toggle</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:hookshot_ready</field><field name="soundcategory">player</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_random_number_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.8</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.2</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:toggle</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="math_number" x="730" y="180"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></xml>
